content:
# Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone furnace setup at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1)
- Stone furnace (position x2)

### Coal and Iron ore processing
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1) receiving iron ore
- Stone furnace (position x2) receiving iron ore
- Stone furnace (position x1) receiving coal
- Stone furnace (position x2) receiving coal

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace is available and not busy before inserting items. Check the status of the furnace to confirm it can accept new materials.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Make sure to extract items only when the furnace has finished processing. Attempting to extract items prematurely may lead to errors or empty extractions.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the target area.
